description: The Bigro is a space mobile armor, distinguished by its incredible speed. Armed with a pair of claws, a powerful mega particle cannonmega particle cannon, and eight missile launchers, it`s ideal for high-speed hit-and-run attacks. When the White Base returns to space after its stopover at Jaburo, it`s pursued by a Bigro launched from Char Aznable`s Zanzibar-class cruiser.
name: Bigro
